page.title: 16INDUSTRY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: On the{Ferndown Industrial Estate}the majority of the 89 firms are heavy industry but there are a few light engineering firms and some warehouses. The products range from paper and printing to brick making. Access to the estate is by four roads and two paths. The largest building belongs to Sherry and Haycock. It extends for some distance behind numbers 19,20 and 21. My Dad works for a wholesale grocery firm. Much of the land is still vacant and I think it is a good place for{wild life,}because beside my Dad's depot we found a rabbit burrow, and in the winter you can see little footprints in the snow. I went with some children in my class and our teacher to talk to the Director of a metal manufacturing works, where raw metal is cast. He gave us a small casting to take back to school.
